summary: Verified all 3 bug fixes for Voice Workspace MVP. All bugs are fixed and working correctly.

issues: ESLint warnings about missing useEffect dependencies (not critical)

bug_1.description: Speaker names not updating in transcript UI (applySpeakerNames function was undefined)
bug_1.verification: Changed Speaker 1 to 'Антон', transcript immediately displayed 'Антон:' instead of 'Speaker 1:'. Function defined at lines 944-954 in ProjectPage.js and correctly used in raw transcript tab (line 498) and processed tab (line 524).

bug_2.description: Analysis reasoning depth not being passed to backend
bug_2.verification: Backend ChatRequestCreate model (line 163) has reasoning_effort field. Frontend handleAnalyze function (line 274-278) passes reasoning_effort in request body. All 6 reasoning effort values (auto, minimal, low, medium, high, xhigh) accepted by backend.

bug_3.description: Reasoning depth selector moved to sticky tab bar
bug_3.verification: Reasoning selector visible in sticky tab bar (lines 450-461) with data-testid='tab-reasoning-select'. Shows 'High — Глубокий анализ' next to 'Обработать' button.

passed_tests: Backend: Login successful with admin credentials
Backend: All 6 reasoning_effort values (auto, minimal, low, medium, high, xhigh) accepted
Backend: Prompts listing returns seeded prompts (master + thematic)
Backend: Speakers endpoint returns correct format
Backend: Transcripts endpoint returns correct format
Frontend: Dashboard loads with project list
Frontend: Project page loads with all 5 tabs visible
Frontend: Reasoning selector visible in sticky tab bar (Bug 3)
Frontend: Speaker renaming updates transcript display (Bug 1)
Frontend: Analysis tab shows prompt select, additional text, and analyze button
seed_data_creation: Used existing seed data from /api/seed endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 reported bugs are verified fixed. Project 'Тест 8' (ID: d52c6fd8-efb6-405d-b07d-9a1f2c22718e) has a raw transcript and multiple speakers, useful for testing speaker name substitution. The reasoning effort selector is in the sticky tab bar and working.
